alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 26 at 1:35PM MST until November 28 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM SUNDAY TO 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...West to southwest winds 35 to 45 MPH with gusts 65 to 75 MPH expected. * WHERE...Lower elevations of Converse and Platte Counties. The strongest winds are expected along Interstate 25 between Glendo and Wheatland. * WHEN...11 AM MST Sunday until 5 AM MST Monday. The strongest winds are expected Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds. A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County
